The Science Pulse is a free tool designed to bridge the gap between the discussions of journalists and scientists within social media platforms. Click here for important notes.

Read about the methodology here.

To suggest a new profile to be included in our platform, use this form.

We would really appreciate any feedback or comments about your experience using this tool, it can help us make a better resource for all. The best way for that is through this short, six-question form.

This project is still in Beta fase and could present some instabilities or higher loading times, especially as we adjust our servers.

NOTES

×
As a data exploratory tool, it is better suited to work on desktop computers, but it also works on mobile. For now, we have only data from Twitter, but we are working to get access to data to create other modules, especially one for Facebook.
